      • permitted

        public static boolean permitted(javax.security.auth.Subject subject,
                                Site site,
                                int action)
        Checks, is action is permitted on site for the specified subject
        Parameters:
        subject - Subject
        site - Site
        action - Action to perform: integer representation of READ, WRITE, ADMIN, TRANSLATE
        Returns:
        true, if action is performed, false - if not

      • permitted

        public static boolean permitted(javax.security.auth.Subject subject,
                                java.security.Permission permission)
        Deprecated. use DigiSecurityManager.checkPermission() instead
        Checks, is specified permission permitted for the given subject
        Parameters:
        subject - Subject
        permission - Permission
        Returns:
        true, if subject has permission. false - if not
